| HistoryText             = The Fellowship of Fear was formed by Zoltan Drago to assist in his masterminded crimes after he first became [[Zoltan Drago (Earth-616)|Mister Fear]]. He chose to recruit [[Raymond Bloch (Earth-616)|Ox]] and [[Leopold Stryke (Earth-616)|The Eel]] primarily because of their low intelligence, making them easier to control.  However, this team was short-lived and soon disbanded after [[Matthew Murdock (Earth-616)|Daredevil]] defeated them, leading to their arrest{{r|Daredevil Vol 1 #6}}.
